user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I love this blush - it looks bright but is buildable. There were no surprises; wonderful quality, smells great, and the packaging is so pretty. I have brown eyes and black hair but I still feel like it complimented my features and complexion.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Auburn', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I really like this blush. It’s not glowy as in super radiant and shimmery so I feel like the wrong words are used to try to describe this blush. It has a tiny sheen, I would say. I have both the coral and pink colors and if you’re very fair to fair and you’ve always dreamed of using these bright colors, this is the blush for you. If you’re medium you might be able to build this up with a proper dense goat haired brush. If you’re skin town is deeper than a medium... I don’t know if you’ll have any luck with this product which is why I’m giving it a 4 star because I feel like these are marketed as universal.

user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
This is my new favorite blush! It's buildable and blendable with a satin finish that doesn't contain glitter or shimmer, which is always visible on my very fair skin. The color may look scary and almost clown like in the pan but it gives a realistic "just in from the cold" flush. As others have mentioned, this is a very small blush but a little goes a long way and there's no kick up, which can waste product. I can't put this blush down and highly recommend it.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Wonderful color and formula! I have VERY pale skin and it's difficult to find a blush color that doesn't make me look like a clown. Also, blush tends to be "streaky" on me and this one blends perfectly!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: This is a very pretty blush and I love the color. Only downside is the price and that it is kind of small but other than that it looks beautiful on the skin. I am more fair/light skin toned and the pink color is perfect for spring/summer.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I am disappointed with this blush. It is not a healthy glow finish, it is more like a matte. The packaging didn’t impress me, but I was surprised that it has a mirror inside. The size is very small and the price is high even for other versions on the market that are bigger. I bought it to replace a Bobbi Brown trio of bronzer/peach blush/highlighter. Sadly this is only the peach blush with a matte finish. The only good thing is that I like to layer products and if I use the Dior Holographic highlighter I have a close result to the Limited Edition of Bobbi Brown that I wanted to replace. That’s the reason that I won’t return it, but I don’t recommend that you invest in this blush, at least that you are looking for a matte finish. Sorry Dior, but I felt that I was cheated...

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: My previous favorite blush was Pale Pink by Bobbi Brown. This is such a beautiful bright pink, but it’s so blendable and it gives a beautiful satin finish! I just can’t go a day without. I also have very sensitive, acne prone skin and this has not caused any flare ups. I think I’ll try the coral one since I love the pink so much!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I guess Dior decided to bring back this blush, because I’ve been wearing it for years! It looks frightening in the pan, but once applied, it gives the most beautiful flush of natural but fresh color! It is a small amount, but a little goes a long way. Absolutely will always have this in my collection!

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: my Ride or Die blush for real
review_content:
This is my favourite blush EVER, and I am a blush gal. I don't wear much makeup at all, so I rely on the few products I use to be the best. I wore this blush to my prom back when it was called a different name & different packaging, but it is still the same. It gives THE most natural amazing blush glow, it looks sooo great on. It's hard to over-do unlike other highly pigmented blushes. Don't let the bright hue scare you, it literally looks perfect on the skin. This product is so underrated!
